meanings.definition: A rare lithium aluminum phosphate mineral with formula (Na,Ca)₂(Li,Fe²⁺)Al(PO₄)₂(OH)
meanings.english_definition: A rare lithium aluminum phosphate mineral with formula (Na,Ca)₂(Li,Fe²⁺)Al(PO₄)₂(OH)

examples.translation: ディッキンソン石はペグマタイト中に見られる。

etymology.value: Named after American geologist Harry Hammond Dickinson.
